name: Story Time (Siobhan Gibson)
description:
It's late. It's dark. You have just finished reading your child a bedtime story. Now, you must escape the bedroom without waking anybody up. 

Controls

  • Controller: Use the right-hand buttons to select which limb to move. Use the left-hand joystick to move the selected limb or limbs.
  • Keyboard: Use the QWAS keys to select which limb to move. Use the arrow keys to move the selected limb or limbs.

-

This game was made in around 16 hours for Unity Brighton Game Jame #3. The theme of the gamejam was STORIES. Programming and character model by Ben Pitt;  assets and level design by Siobhan Gibson. 

Known issues:

  • There's Lego colliding somewhere in the first 30 seconds of the game.
  • You can sometimes fly. We don't encourage it.
